trans-unit.source: Allows a type converter to access schema information stored on an object.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um conversor de tipos aceder a informações de esquema armazenadas num objeto.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> classes.
trans-unit.target: Esta interface é implementada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>classes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: These implementations are used by the .NET Framework and are not intended for use in your code.
trans-unit.target: Estas implementações são utilizadas pelo .NET Framework e não foram concebidas para utilização no seu código.

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets or sets the schema associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada, obtém ou define o esquema associado ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> classes.
